text: Naa-chan, what are you looking at...?

...Ah, it's a magazine feature...
Tenka and Chiyuki-san... They gave me a lot of thanks...

But there's still someone important I haven't
expressed gratitude to yet. Can I come over here for a bit?

Hehe, this is a "thank you" gift for Mom
from Amana and Tenka-chan!

...! Then...
Tenka, too... will choose... for Dad...!

...Uh...
But... I don't know about flowers...

If you put your feelings into it firmly,
any flower will surely be fine!
